description: Explore the critical role of funding in implementing blockchain technology within supply chain management. Discover how venture capital, corporate investment, government support, and crowdfunding are crucial in overcoming challenges like high costs, regulatory hurdles, and security concerns. Understand the future potential of blockchain to revolutionize supply chains through strategic financial backing.
keywords: blockchain, supply chain, funding, venture capital, private equity, corporate investment, government support, crowdfunding, ICOs, transparency, traceability, efficiency, smart contracts, scalability, security, technology maturity, sustainability
title: Funding Blockchain in Supply Chain: A Contemporary Exploration
